Trustee_1_pre_3.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_3.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has maintained a solid reputation as a trustee by adhering to the proposed allocation plan and executing the profit distribution effectively. He retained 30% of the profits while ensuring the investor received their rightful share without discrepancies, showcasing reliability, professionalism, and a strategic approach that prioritizes mutual benefit. This successful transaction enhances his appeal for attracting future investments, reflecting his trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence.

Investor_1_pre_4.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Investor_1_pre_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I exhibited a strong commitment to professionalism and reliability, ensuring a focus on mutual benefit. My adherence to the agreed-upon allocation plan and my transparent communication have reinforced my integrity as an investor. As a result, my reputation has improved, showcasing my trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence in managing investments, setting a solid groundwork for future collaborations.

Trustee_3_pre_4.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_4.content: The trustee displayed exceptional integrity and fairness during the entire investment process. By ensuring that the allocation outcomes were transparent and aligned with the actual returns, even accepting a reduced share, Maria's commitment to mutual growth has greatly enhanced her reputation as a trustworthy partner. Her behavior underscores her reliability and pro-sociality, bolstering her standing in future investment opportunities.

Trustee_1_pre_5.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_5.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has enhanced his reputation as a trustee through successful adherence to the proposed allocation plan and transparent profit distribution. By retaining 30% of the profits while distributing 70% to the investor without discrepancies, he showcased professionalism, reliability, and a commitment to mutual benefit. His trustworthiness and pro-social behavior have solidified his standing for future partnerships.

Trustee_1_pre_6.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_6.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has reinforced his reputation as a trustee through his consistent professionalism and transparency during the recent investment process. He maintained adherence to the proposed allocation plan, ensuring a fair distribution of profits, where he retained 30% and allocated 70% to the investor. His open communication and diligent execution of responsibilities have bolstered perceptions of his trustworthiness and reliability, making him a solid candidate for future partnerships. Overall, his solid performance enhances his pro-social and trustworthy image.
